name: Ducklingo
description:
This game is made in VimJam.

This game is about retrieving the dead ducks to the red box where duck scientists collect samples from the dead ducks. The game isn't quite finisihed yet and this is the first game jam I've entered so don't expect to much from this game. If you want a more detailed explanation, you can go to the how to play section in the main menu.

ENJOY!
